name: koconut
description: Provide interchainable array, set, map and etc supporting both normal and async callbacks as their action arguments.

scripts.pro: yarn pro@update && yarn pro@build && yarn pro@lint && yarn pro@config && yarn doc@render && yarn test
scripts.pro@build: ts-node ./commands/DirectoryCleaner.task.ts && babel ./test --out-dir ./coverage/nodejs --extensions .ts,.tsx && ts-node ./commands/ManualCoveragePathsResolver.task.ts && babel ./src --out-dir dist --extensions .ts,.tsx && tsc && webpack && echo Build Completed
scripts.pro@config: ts-node ./commands/TopicsFetcher.task.ts && ts-node ./commands/BowerConfig.task.ts && echo Set publish config
scripts.pro@lint: echo Applying Linter on Package files... && eslint --fix --ext .js,.ts dist && echo Linting Completed
scripts.test: echo Preparing Unit Test... && nyc mocha -r ts-node/register ./test/*.spec.ts && echo Unit Test Completed
scripts.test@validate: yarn test && ts-node ./commands/DepreactedMethodValidator.task.ts -f && echo Validating deprecation method completed.
scripts.test@sequence: echo Preparing Unit Test... && mocha -r ts-node/register ./test/*Sequence.spec.ts && echo Unit Test Completed
scripts.test@sample: mocha -r ts-node/register ./test/Sample.test.ts && echo Sample Test Completed
